授業目的: This course introduces students to various aspects of contemporary Chinese culture and society. Making use of recent reports from English language media sources, it helps students to become informed of current developments in Chinese society and to analyze them from a comparative, global perspective.
到達目標: After taking this course, students will gain an appreciation of the huge changes China is experiencing as well as the social and cultural challenges the country faces. Students will also acquire skills in critical thinking, argumentation, and expository writing.
授業方法:
Mini lecture, class discussion, essay writing, presentation. Zoom lessons for students who have received permission to study online.
Please note that part of this course will be conducted in the COIL/VE format with our collaborating partner Hong Kong Shue Yan University. This class is a pre-applying course. The class will be held in face-to-face format.
